name: There's a Wolf in my Cubicle
name_original: There's a Wolf in my Cubicle
description:
There's A Wolf In My Cubicle is a top down 2D action/ strategy game, where the player controls an accountant named Randal Champagne who's been recently laid off.

He's also a wolf for some reason.

• Eat your tasty fellow animal Co-Workers -
They never really liked you anyways.

• Lunge your away across different office environments -
Be careful though, tampering with office property might result in death

• Conduct an exit interview with your Boss -
Just don't expect a letter of recommendation

• Find all 8 email collectables -
Woah! Looks like a Nigerian Prince is offering you his vast fortune completely unsolicited!
